After a car accident that left him in a coma and killed his wife and son, Jeff wakes up and discovers he is able to see the ghosts of people who died horrible deaths. Seeking peace of mind, Jeff goes to a spiritual advisor who explains that these spirits are trapped in a world of shadows, forced to relive their own deaths for all eternity and that the family of Jeff met the same fate. To save them, he will have Jeff enter the world of shadows and free their souls.
